title: Updated image paths in API docs to match OPS requirements
body: As discussed ... this is a small change in the way we reference images, due to the way docfx copies the resources to the server. To sum it up, going forward keep the images in the same `_images` folder in the namespace, but prefix the path with `xamarin-media/<The Namespace>/_images/`
